review: Love this thing, it is easy to use and very versatile.  I don't want to give the money grubbing cable company an almost criminal fee for 'activating' the already installed second wall outlet in my bedroom so I bought this.  I plugged it into the HDMI port and had almost instant access to all my streaming apps (Netflix, music, photos...).  I also side loaded a few apps and now have free cable and movies.  The Is simple and works great, the stick is easy to navigate and the quality is good; I would definitely recommend this.

review: I bought this device because there is a Slingbox app, which enables you to stream Cable TV from another location directly to the TV rather than streaming it to an iPhone or iPad and then projecting that picture on the TV with AirPlay and Apple TV.  However, the picture quality using the Slingbox app and Fire TV Stick is inferior to that obtained when using iPhone/iPad and Apple TV.  So the cumbersome method produces a superior picture, which is as close to HD as gonna get.  I'm not sure if it's the app or the TV stick but I will only use the Firestick in a pinch.  It's unfortunate that Amazon or the app developer could not take advantage of this opportunity.  I would not recommend Fire TV stick for Slingbox users unless convenience trumps picture quality.
